document.full_text: abbott laboratories inc's experimental absorb heart stent, designed to dissolve and thereby restore the blood vessel's natural flexibility, has proven safe and effective a year after being implanted in patients, researchers said.
document.title: abbott absorbable stent shows good results
lines_and_colors: abbott laboratories inc's experimental absorb heart stent, designed to dissolve and thereby restore the blood vessel's natural flexibility, has proven safe and effective a year after being implanted in patients, researchers said.
